articles.description: Chelsea news: The Blues have been left short of attacking options due to an injury for Armando Broja but may already have an answer within the squad
articles.content: Chelsea could soon be welcoming another new face into their first team set-up as Graham Potter's squad revamp speeds up heading into January. As much as the Blues are already dealing with an unpredic… [+3606 chars]
